definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: be cornered, thrust into a corner, or aside;—Impf. 3 ms. [[וְלאׁ יִכָּנֵף עוֹד מוֹרֶיְ֔]] Is 30:20 and no more shall thy teachers be thrust into a corner (cf. Di); > others, who render hide themselves, (cf. Ar. kanafa enclose, guard, but this rather for protection).
